About



We believe NFTs are about having fun & sharing the experience with your friends, so we brought donuts to the party! We also believe that PFP NFTs are just the tip of the iceberg, and we want to invite you to join us along this journey.

What originally started as a companion to the Rugged Mugs become something a bit more dangerous. We got a bit carried away and ended up with 456 individual traits! Jelly and Jam-packed with so many nutty and iconic traits with a tastey twist, we decided to open the fun up to everyone!

Each Donut functions as a token to collabs, unlockables, airdrops, priority & exclusive token access to drops, giveaways, community events, premium merch & more. At the end of the day, it's really all about the Fun, Frens, Memes, and Mems we'll make along this journey! And the donuts are your ticket to this experience.

The only question you have to ask yourself is ... do you like to live dangerously?





Menu



Traits



The Danger Donuts collection contains 456 hand drawn traits capable of creating over 1 TRILLION unique combinations of NFTs. However, the collection size is limited to just 6,942 donuts.

The Danger Donuts collection is novel because the collection is separated into four different batches. Each batch contains uinique flavors that are only found in one of the four batches. All of the donut types in the 1st batch are shown below. Will you be able to collect all of the traits?!


Story


A short time ago, AI Web3 Explorer DAN-G3R AKA Danger Dan or just “Danger” was on adventure, exploring the farthest corners of the metaverse without a roadmap. Unexpectedly, Danger discovered a flock of wild creatures that resembled what he could best describe as a field of Donuts!

Eager to help & curious about where these beings came from, Danger decides to give them shelter in his high tech data lab, but quickly realizes he doesn’t have enough room.

Soon after, Danger hatches the brilliant idea to have the Donuts adopted so they can all have new homes while he continues to learn what they are, and where they come from. Little does Danger know, the Donuts have a darker history, and a past in the future…

Minting Perks: Merch, Airdrops, & Tiers


We would like to say thank you in advance to those that decide to mint Danger Donuts! To express our gratitute, we have implemented some minting rewards for those that decide to mint multiple danger donuts.

Minters that mint 6 or more donuts in a single transaction will receive a FREE Danger Donuts hat! And anyone that mints 12 or more donuts at once will receive a FREE custom Danger Donuts t-shirt with your favorite Danger Donut NFT.

Donut minters will also be rewarded for minting and holding. Every month the Danger Donuts team will reward holders by airdropping custom Leo Sal 1/1 pieces. The number or airdrops someone receives will be based on the number of Danger Donuts held, which determines the membership tier.

1 Danger Donut NFT = Standard Membership & 12 Airdrops/Year
12 Danger Donut NFTs = Premium Membership & 24 Airdrops/Year
60 Danger Donut NFTs = Elite Membership & 36 Airdrops/Year

FAQ



What are the Danger Donuts?
The Danger Donuts are a collection of 6,942 Donuts living dangerously on the ethereum blockchain.

The Danger Donuts are the second generative collection from LeoSal. This Danger Donuts collection adds some danger to the mug club!
How many NFTs are in the Danger Donuts collection?
The Danger Donuts collection contains 6,942 NFTs.
How many unique traits are in the collection?
The Danger Donuts collection consists of over 456 hand drawn traits.
When does the Danger Donuts mint begin?
The public mint begins in mid/late May of 2022.
What is the mint price?
All Rugged Mugs holders will be airdropped Danger Donuts for mugs that they own.

The public mint prices are as-follows:
1 Donut = 0.0169 ETH
2 Donuts = 0.0169 ETH (BOGO)
6 Donuts = 0.05 ETH
12 Donuts = 0.09 ETH
13 Donuts = 0.0969 ETH
How do Rugged Mugs holders claim their free donuts?
No action is required for Rugged Mugs holders to receive their free donuts. The donuts will be airdropped to holders leading up to the Danger Donuts public mint.
Can I mint mint a custom number of donuts that is not on the menu, for example 3 donuts?
No, currently the donut shop is only accepting orders of 1, 2, 6, 12, and 13 donuts. Custom order quantities are not available at this time.
What are the perks of minting & holding Danger Donuts?
Each Donut functions as a token to collabs, unlockables, airdrops, priority & exclusive token access to drops, giveaways, community events, premium merch & more.

Our Team

Leo Sal

Founder, Designer, & Visionary


Jack of All Trades, Master of None, Yet Often Better than a Master of One.

Leo Sal is a 27 year old Creator who often finds himself wearing multiple hats. From 8 years of Freelance Design, mixed with 3 years of Brand Consulting, to Founding and Retiring his own Apparel Brand turned IG Meme page, Leo’s always been one to form his own path to the beat of his 808 Drums.

A dreamer at heart and lover of design, pop culture, music, movies, streetwear, sneakers, fashion, food, and all the collabs in between, Leo’s been looking for the next outlet to combine all his passions & found a dangerous weapon in Web3.

He was interested in NFTs since April 2020, but didn’t make the jump until his friend Mike reached out, putting together a team in June 2021. Since then there’s been no looking back.



Mike

Front End Designer


Mike is a 27 year old engineer from the Midwest. He started collecting NFTs in April of 2021 with and was instantly hooked on the art, the community, and the technology.

In June of 2021 he assembled the dream team to create and develop the Rugged Mugs. The Rugged Mugs set out to be the first generative PFP project based upon coffee and tea NFTs.

Leo Sal, Phil, and Ash helped Mike achieve his goal to create the Rugged Mugs, which fostered an incredible community.

Since creating the Rugged Mugs project, Mike has continued to dive deeper into the Web3 space, developing skills as a web designer and amature solidity developer. He hopes to provide value to the Rugged Mugs / Danger Donuts holders and to all of the communities that he has interacted with during his Web3 journery so far.

Phil

Smart Contract Developer


Phil is an experienced engineer and developer who works for an industry Leading Tech company on the West Coast. He has over 10 years of coding experience and is proficient in solidity and many other languages.

He started investing in crypto in 2017, primarily with Bitcoin, and he got his start in the Web3 space in 2021 as the lead developer for the Rugged Mugs.

Developing Web3 projects is a new-found passion for Phil, who continues to take on new projects, innovate on previous ideas, and execute at a high-level. He is very detail oriented and takes great pride in his work.

Finally, he is excited to bring the Danger Donuts community tremendous gas savings compared to the gas fees associated with the Rugged Mugs mint.
